## flowcore

https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/flowCore.html


```{r}
library(flowCore)
```


```{r}
file.name <- system.file("extdata","0877408774.B08", 
                         package="flowCore")
x <- read.FCS(file.name, transformation=FALSE)
summary(x)

```



### meta data

pData(parameters(x))
